description: Seven Aces Ltd.'s 70-per-cent-held subsidiary Lucky Bucks LLC has acquired three gaming contracts in Georgia state from J&G Amusement Inc. for $2.64-million (U.S.).

subjectCode.description: Trading Impact (ICE Codes) Important Corporate Events

text:
Seven Aces Ltd (TSX-V:ACES)  
Shares Issued 72,955,960  
Last Close 6/3/2020 $1.63  
Wednesday June 03 2020 \- News Release

Mr. Manu Sekhri reports

SEVEN ACES LIMITED ACQUIRES THREE ADDITIONAL GAMING CONTRACTS

Seven Aces Ltd.'s 70-per-cent-owned subsidiary, Lucky Bucks LLC, has acquired
three additional gaming contracts from digital skill-based gaming terminal
operators based in the U.S. state of Georgia. Lucky Bucks acquired three
location contracts from J&G Amusement Inc. in exchange for cash consideration
of $2.64-million (U.S.) on closing. Pursuant to the terms of the J&G
acquisition, the aggregate purchase price payable to J&G will be adjusted up
or down based on the actual performance of the acquired location contracts. In
the event that the performance of the acquired location contracts materially
differs from historical results, the aggregate purchase price paid for the
contracts acquired from J&G may materially increase or decrease.

Manu Sekhri, chief executive officer of Seven Aces, added the following
remarks, "Having finalized our settlement with the Georgia Lottery Corp. and
the amendment to our credit facility, we look forward to continued growth and
are excited to add these three locations to our current portfolio."

The purchase price for the J&G acquisition was financed by Lucky Bucks through
an advance under the credit facility described in the press release of the
company dated Jan. 29, 2020, and titled "Seven Aces Limited Announces New
US$165 Million Credit Facility and Acquisition of Additional Gaming
Contracts." The gaming contracts that have been acquired are fully licensed
and governed by the Georgia Lottery Corp., and offer players a variety of
skill-based coin-operated amusement machines.

About Seven Aces Ltd.

Seven Aces is a gaming company, with a vision of building a diversified
portfolio of world-class gaming operations. The company looks to enhance
shareholder value by expanding organically and through acquisitions.
Currently, the company is the largest route operator of skill-based gaming
machines in the state of Georgia, United States.

We seek Safe Harbor.

title: ACES Seven Aces acquires three Georgia gaming contracts
html:
Seven Aces Ltd (TSX-V:ACES)
Shares Issued 72,955,960
Last Close 6/3/2020 $1.63
Wednesday June 03 2020 - News Release

Mr. Manu Sekhri reports

SEVEN ACES LIMITED ACQUIRES THREE ADDITIONAL GAMING CONTRACTS

Seven Aces Ltd.'s 70-per-cent-owned subsidiary, Lucky Bucks LLC, has acquired three additional gaming contracts from digital skill-based gaming terminal operators based in the U.S. state of Georgia. Lucky Bucks acquired three location contracts from J&G Amusement Inc. in exchange for cash consideration of $2.64-million (U.S.) on closing. Pursuant to the terms of the J&G acquisition, the aggregate purchase price payable to J&G will be adjusted up or down based on the actual performance of the acquired location contracts. In the event that the performance of the acquired location contracts materially differs from historical results, the aggregate purchase price paid for the contracts acquired from J&G may materially increase or decrease.

Manu Sekhri, chief executive officer of Seven Aces, added the following remarks, "Having finalized our settlement with the Georgia Lottery Corp. and the amendment to our credit facility, we look forward to continued growth and are excited to add these three locations to our current portfolio."

The purchase price for the J&G acquisition was financed by Lucky Bucks through an advance under the credit facility described in the press release of the company dated Jan. 29, 2020, and titled "Seven Aces Limited Announces New US$165 Million Credit Facility and Acquisition of Additional Gaming Contracts." The gaming contracts that have been acquired are fully licensed and governed by the Georgia Lottery Corp., and offer players a variety of skill-based coin-operated amusement machines.

About Seven Aces Ltd.

Seven Aces is a gaming company, with a vision of building a diversified portfolio of world-class gaming operations. The company looks to enhance shareholder value by expanding organically and through acquisitions. Currently, the company is the largest route operator of skill-based gaming machines in the state of Georgia, United States.

We seek Safe Harbor.
